name: Matterpoll
description: Polling feature for Mattermost's custom slash command

settings.help_text: Trigger Word must be unique, and cannot begin with a slash or contain any spaces.
When true, Matterpoll will render poll posts with a rich UI. The rich UI is not available on mobile app.

settings_schema.footer: * To report an issue, make a suggestion or a contribution, [check the repository](https://github.com/matterpoll/matterpoll).
